newsitem.title: ITALY: ALPINE SKIING-PROFILE OF DOWNHILL WINNER GHEDINA.
newsitem.headline: ALPINE SKIING-PROFILE OF DOWNHILL WINNER GHEDINA.

text.p: Profile of the winner of Saturday's men's World Cup downhill:
Previous World Cup victories: (Four) Cortina d'Ampezzo 1990, Are 1990, Wengen 1995, Whistler 1995.

Other facts: Comes from Cortina, suffered a serious car crash in April 1991 and was in a coma for two days. Downhill silver medallist in 1996 world championships, silver in combined in 1991. His mother died in an avalanche when he was 15.
